Megatron used all his might to hold them down where they were, and
continue crushing. His recoil weapon, then folded under his arm, and
took aim at Unitron's stomach. Megatron smiled, then fired it twice.

KSLawdogg@... wrote:
> 
> Unitron:
> 
> Unitron closed his mouth tight in pain as he felt his wrists being slowly
> crushed.  He pushed forward hard nonetheless, trying to slam his right elbow
> into Megatron's face.
> "Give up, impostor, and you will not die too painfully for your crimes."
